name: Fire in the TOWN
description:
In the game you start with 1min and have to extinguish fires in the town. Every time you extinguish new fire you get some extra time. I hope you enjoy this little prototype.

To be fair I have no idea how far I will the project - I am sure that I will at least improve some graphical aspects, add sound and music, fix minor bugs that there are but this may never become a bigger game than that! 

Controls:

WSAD - drive the Fire Truck

Space - brake 

Left Mouse Button - water cannon

Tip: Don't turn on the maximum speed, you will lose control :)
